Class VectorSpaceModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • VectorSpaceModel

  • public class VectorSpaceModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Andreas.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VectorSpaceModel(org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery query, org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader, javax.swing.JProgressBar prog_bar)
      The Constructor of the VectorSpaceModel, which initializes a document frequency map which holds the mapping to the document frequency of a term.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VectorSpaceModel

        public VectorSpaceModel(org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery query,
                        org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader,
                        javax.swing.JProgressBar prog_bar)
        The Constructor of the VectorSpaceModel, which initializes a document frequency map which holds the mapping to the document frequency of a term. Also a ArrayList with Doc objects of all pages in the index is initialized and therefore also the inlinks for a doc are set.
        Parameters:
        query - initializing query to fill the cache
        reader - the IndexReader
        prog_bar - a progress bar object to display the current progress of initialization

    • Method Detail

      • scoreDocs

        public void scoreDocs()
        Scoring all documents by summing up the tfidf values of a document.

      • scoreDocs_cosine

        public void scoreDocs_cosine()
        Wrapper method for normal call of scoreDocs_cosine with standard argument of evaluation boolean set to false

      • scoreDocs_cosine

        public void scoreDocs_cosine(boolean evaluation)
        Scores all documents by calculating the angle between the query and each document. Also resets all documents before start of calculation, so the previous search has no influence. This method also takes automatically the percentage of the restriction slider into account when calculating.
        Parameters:
        evaluation - the bool for evaluation mode or not, speeds up the evaluation, but can also lead to OutOfMemoryError when too many documents loaded.

      • getDocFreq

        public int getDocFreq(org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef token)
        Returns the documents frequency depending to a term.
        Parameters:
        token - the token for which the document frequency should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        returns the integer document frequency value for the given term

      • inverseDocFreq

        public double inverseDocFreq(org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef token)
        Parameters:
        token - the BytesRef token for which the inverse document frequency should be retrieved
        Returns:
        returns the inverse document frequency for a token

      • getDocs

        public java.util.ArrayList<Doc> getDocs()
        Returns:
        returns the ArrayList with all documents.

      • calcTfIdf

        public double calcTfIdf(org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef token,
                        Doc doc,
                        org.apache.lucene.index.PostingsEnum docs)
        Calculates the tfidf value depending on the term and the document.
        Parameters:
        token - the token for which the tfidf weight should be calculated
        doc - the document to which the token belongs
        docs - the postingsenum containing the posting list for the token from the index
        Returns:
        returns the tfidf value which belongs to the term, document pair.

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery query)
        Overloaded method for setting the query if the query is a BooleanQuery
        Parameters:
        query - contains the BooleanQuery consisting of several terms

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(org.apache.lucene.search.TermQuery query)
        Overloaded method for setting the query if the query is a TermQuery.
        Parameters:
        query - contains the TermQuery consisting of a single term.

      • cosine_similarity

        public double cosine_similarity(Doc doc1,
                                Doc doc2)
        Wrapper function for calling the cosine similarity with standard of evaluation bool on false
        Parameters:
        doc1 - The first of the two Docs where the similarity should be calculated
        doc2 - The second Doc
        Returns:
        returns the angle between the two documents

      • cosine_similarity

        public double cosine_similarity(Doc doc1,
                                Doc doc2,
                                boolean evaluation)
        Method for calculating the cosine similarity between two documents. Therefore the tfidf vectors are retrieved for the documents and then the angle between the two vectors are calculated.
        Parameters:
        doc1 - The first of the two Docs where the similarity should be calculated
        doc2 - The second Doc
        evaluation - evaluation boolean, when set to true, speed up calculation is done
        Returns:
        returns the angle between the two documents vectors

      • PseudoRelevanceFeedbackRocchio

        public void PseudoRelevanceFeedbackRocchio(int number_top_ranked,
                                           Doc query)
        The standard method call without setting the weightings for the relevant documents and the query.
        Parameters:
        number_top_ranked - the number of top ranked documents which should be used for prf
        query - the query document from the initial query

      • PseudoRelevanceFeedbackRocchio

        public void PseudoRelevanceFeedbackRocchio(int number_top_ranked,
                                           Doc query,
                                           double alpha,
                                           double beta,
                                           double gamma)
        Calculated the new query by using rocchios pseudo relevance feedback, with the set weights for the query, the relevant documents and the irrelevant documents.
        Parameters:
        number_top_ranked - the number of top ranked documents which should be used for prf
        query - the query document from the initial query
        alpha - the weight for the initial query
        beta - the weight for the relevant documents
        gamma - the weight for the irrelevant documents

      • getQueryDoc

        public Doc getQueryDoc()
        Returns:
        returns the query document which has been set

      • getCategoryTree

        public CategoryTree getCategoryTree()
        Returns:
        returns the CategoryTree

      • addProgBar

        public void addProgBar(javax.swing.JProgressBar prog_bar)

      • buildCategoryTree

        public void buildCategoryTree()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Builds up the CategoryTree by running through all documents parents, which have been extracted while indexing and by using the link graph file which has been extracted from the database, when Categories are enabled.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception is thrown, when reading from the link_graph file fails

      • setAmountRestricted

        public void setAmountRestricted(int amount_restricted)
        Sets the amount of restricted documents
        Parameters:
        amount_restricted - the amount of restricted documents

      • getDocuments

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Doc> getDocuments()
        Returns:
        returns the HashMap containing the document name, document mappings

      • resetDocs

        public void resetDocs(boolean evaluation)
        Resets the documents from the previous search, when evaluation boolean is set, then also tfidf vector is set to null.
        Parameters:
        evaluation - boolean to determine if the tf-idf vector should be reset

      • resetDocs

        public void resetDocs()
        Wrapper function for calling reset docs with standard value false for evaluation.

      • getResultSet

        public java.util.ArrayList<Doc> getResultSet()
        Returns:
        returns the result set of a search

      • getDocName

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDocName()

        public java.util.ArrayList<Topic> getTopicsFromHashMap()

      • BM25Scoring

        public void BM25Scoring(Doc query)
        This method implements the BM25 scoring method, which takes with respect to cosine similarity the length of the documents into account.
        Parameters:
        query - A Doc Object which contains the terms of the query.

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCoOccurrences()
        Returns:
        Returns the Hashmap containing the co-occurrences to a tag.
